name: Jordan Matthews
persona: Jordan Matthews is a 20-year-old Business Administration student who has struggled academically, reflected in a CGPA of 1.13. Jordan finds it challenging to stay organized and motivated, often lacking the discipline needed to keep up with coursework. While test anxiety isn't a major issue, Jordan's low self-efficacy and perseverance suggest a need for greater support and encouragement. Jordan is aware of the need to improve and is seeking ways to build better study habits and motivation.
